script.name: plugin.piracy.blackmarket
script.description: Piracy: Black Market Trader: Sell illegal goods to stations

comment.var: -------------------- BLACK MARKET TRADER by MISTER BEAR v1.50 --------------------
Allows you to trade Black Market Wares with Pirate stations and randomly occuring factories of normal races.
Allows you to buy entry to hostile pirate stations for 30 minutes.
[LOCAL][STATION] Piracy.BlackMarket.aStationStockLevels : [int] [array] : Stock level of each Black Market Ware
[LOCAL][STATION] Piracy.BlackMarket.iStationAccessCountdown : [int] [optional] : Game time when access will be revoked
[LOCAL][STATION] Piracy.BlackMarket.iStationDockingFee : [int] [optional] : Docking fee remaining before access is granted
NOTES: UNFRIENDLY stations (hostile) require a docking fee, FRIENDLY (non-hostile) stations do not. Once the fee is paid
the station becomes HACKED for 30 minutes and TRADING becomes available. With FRIENDLY stations trading is always available.
Define which wares are Black Market
Get stock info or generate new
Get docking data from station
If countdown has expired, reset the station to unfriendly, generate new docking fee
Determine Station state
Define whether player is within 20km of station
Display one of three welcome messages depending on current station state

line.text: add custom menu info line to array

comment.var: Display a Transaction notification if appropriate
DIRECT MONEY PAYMENT
GOODS SALE

line.text: add custom menu info line to array

comment.var: Display a warning if user is out of range

line.text: add custom menu info line to array

comment.var: Create header: Station Goods, Price, Current Stock Level, Amount

line.text: add custom menu heading to array

comment.var: DISPLAY STOCK LEVELS FOR WEED, WHISKEY, SLAVES and SIDEARMS
Create header: Payment Options / Your Goods, Price, Price Quality, Total Value

line.text: add custom menu heading to array

comment.var: Display Transactions
Add Direct Payment in UNFRIENDLY mode
Pay partial docking fee or whole if we can afford it.
load text, format credits, assemble, highlight and add to menu: 'Direct Payment in Credits'

line.text: create text for custom menu, left=
add custom menu item to array

comment.var: ---------------- DISPLAY AVAILABLE ACTIONS ----------------
Create header: (Inc. Player credits) 'Available: %s'
'Actions Available'

line.text: create text for custom menu, left=
add custom menu heading to array

comment.var: 'Close Black Market Trading Interface'

line.text: add custom menu item to array

comment.var: Display STATION NAME and SECTOR in description
Display and catch CANCEL : 'Sell Black Market Wares'
----------------- PERFORM SELECTED TRANSACTION -----------------
Calculate 'Price', 'Quantity' and 'Value' for selected ware
Add ware to station
Remove ware from cargo bay
Reduce DOCKING FEE by VALUE of GOODS SOLD
If fee is now PAID in full, BEFRIEND the station and set the ACCESS COUNTDOWN
Credit station and Debit player
PAY player for SALE of black market wares
REFRESH DIALOG
GENERATE DOCKING FEE : Generates a new docking fee and removes the access countdown
GENERATE NEW STOCK LEVELS : Generate a random amount of each stock and set new docking fee if appropriate
LIST STOCK LEVEL : DISPLAY THE STOCK LEVEL OF A WARE, USING A PROGRESS BAR
PARAM : [int] iCount : Index of ware in stock array
Format 'Price', 'Current Stock Level' and 'Quantity'
Assemble List box item

line.text: add custom menu item to array

comment.var: CALCULATE TRANSACTION DATA : Calculate unit price, number you'll sell, their total value.
PARAM : [int] iCount : Index of ware in stock array
RETURN VALUE : [int] iProductQuantity, iPurchaseSize
If we have more than required to pay the docking fee, limit us to using that amount.
Also limit us to the maximum stock this station can hold (of this ware)
Calculate 'purchase size'
CALCULATE WARE PRICE : Calculate the unit price of a ware based on the current stock level
. (max - min) x (100 - stock) stock x (max - min) stock
. 100 100 max stock
PARAMETERS : [int] iCount
RETURN VALUE : [ware] oWare [int] iStock, iStockMax, iProductPrice and iPercentage
DISPLAY TRANSACTION DATA : IF TRANSACTION IS VALID, ASSEMBLE SUB-ITEMS INTO AN ITEM.
************************** (DISPLAY DISABLED IF USER HAS CARGO BUT IS TOO FAR TO TRADE)
PARAM [int] iCount : Index of ware in stock array
PARAM [int] iProductPrice : Unit price of ware
PARAM [int] iProductQuantity : Number to sell
PARAM [int] iPurchaseSize : Cost of purchase
Comma delimit prices and format quantity (they're saved in previous function anyway)
Highlight if within range, grey and prevent clicking if otherwise
Create normal bar and highlighted text

line.text: add custom menu item to array

comment.var: Create disabled bar and normal text

line.text: add custom menu item to array

sval.val: Piracy: Black Market Trader: Sell illegal goods to stations
%s - %s
%s / %s
%s x %s
Station with whom to trade
-------------------- BLACK MARKET TRADER by MISTER BEAR v1.50 --------------------
Allows you to trade Black Market Wares with Pirate stations and randomly occuring factories of normal races.
Allows you to buy entry to hostile pirate stations for 30 minutes.
[LOCAL][STATION] Piracy.BlackMarket.aStationStockLevels : [int] [array] : Stock level of each Black Market Ware
[LOCAL][STATION] Piracy.BlackMarket.iStationAccessCountdown : [int] [optional] : Game time when access will be revoked
[LOCAL][STATION] Piracy.BlackMarket.iStationDockingFee : [int] [optional] : Docking fee remaining before access is granted
NOTES: UNFRIENDLY stations (hostile) require a docking fee, FRIENDLY (non-hostile) stations do not. Once the fee is paid
the station becomes HACKED for 30 minutes and TRADING becomes available. With FRIENDLY stations trading is always available.
Define which wares are Black Market
Get stock info or generate new
Get docking data from station
If countdown has expired, reset the station to unfriendly, generate new docking fee
Determine Station state
Define whether player is within 20km of station
Display one of three welcome messages depending on current station state
Display a Transaction notification if appropriate

GOODS SALE
Display a warning if user is out of range
Create header: Station Goods, Price, Current Stock Level, Amount

Display Transactions
Add Direct Payment in UNFRIENDLY mode
Pay partial docking fee or whole if we can afford it.

Add ware to station

Reduce DOCKING FEE by VALUE of GOODS SOLD
If fee is now PAID in full, BEFRIEND the station and set the ACCESS COUNTDOWN
Credit station and Debit player
PAY player for SALE of black market wares
REFRESH DIALOG

If we have more than required to pay the docking fee, limit us to using that amount.
Also limit us to the maximum stock this station can hold (of this ware)
Calculate 'purchase size'

. (max - min) x (100 - stock) stock x (max - min) stock
. 100 100 max stock
PARAMETERS : [int] iCount
RETURN VALUE : [ware] oWare [int] iStock, iStockMax, iProductPrice and iPercentage
